title: We’re investing $3B in AI to accelerate clients’ reinvention
content: We’re launching Accenture AI Navigator for Enterprise to help our clients across all industries rapidly and responsibly put the promise and power of AI to work.
buttomContext: Investment in AI over three years

title: State of Cybersecurity Resilience 2023
content: Cyber transformers are excelling at both business resilience and business outcomes—with high-performing cybersecurity propelling their digital transformations forward.
buttomContext: more likely that cyber transformers have more effective digital transformations.
